viewData.name: Phi Stabilizer 151
viewData.short_description: Phi stabilizer is s special cartridge stability disk, used to achieve more precision and control while working with a machine. It provides stability, prevents hand tremors and machine vibrations. The result is much more thinner and realistic hairs .
viewData.long_description: Great way to achieve more density while working even with problematic or oily skin, gain better depth control and create much crisper lines in order to achieve ultra natural look. Provides much higher command of your work and the possibility to fully control the patterns you are working on. Suitable for all Simplicity PMU machines.
